name: HK Voice
tag_list: hong-kong-directory, business-reviews, recommend, refer, review, consumer-experience, business-directory
description: Business Review Site in Hong Kong
overview: HKvoice is the fastest-growing business review site in Asia. Our large community of consumer reviewers share their experience and opinions from an extensive list of companies in Hong Kong. Find the best businesses recommended by real customers with our extensive business reviews. We help companies collate reviews and get a real insight straight from the people that matter most, their customers. You as a customer, can VOICE your opinion and improve customer satisfaction for the whole of Hong Kong.
